item.title: I'm using Elmstatic for my blog
item.description:
Elmstatic is a static blog generator
It allows you to write pages in Elm, and blog posts in Markdown.
This is an example of a post
Code is highlighted using Highlight.js:
view : Header v m -> List (Element PageStyles v m) -> Html.Html m view header contentElems = viewport stylesheet <| column Main [ center, width (percent 100) ] [ header , column Main [ width <| px 800, spacingXY 0 10, alignLeft ] contentElems ...
